about_the_game:
Welcome to the absurd world of Hitler My Friend - a 3D shooter that will change your ideas about alternative history! In this game you will climb into the boots of the unforeseen Adolf Hitler and go in search of the last representative of the Ururi race.

Lost in an underwater laboratory surrounded by ruthless communists, Hitler must fight his way through waves of dark humor and destroy all the Gomorites in his path. Go deep under the water, where dangers await in the form of Soviet sea dolphins and various traps.

Immerse yourself in this absurd underwater world where humor becomes a weapon and Hitler is a failed hero in search of an exotic race. Mixing dark humor with madness, Hitler My Friend promises a unique and unpredictable experience that definitely stands out in the sea of shooters on Steam


What awaits you in the game:
  • Lots of dangerous, funny, absurd enemies;
  • Lots of funny and dangerous traps (Boom and you're gone)
  • Play as the most legendary character HITLER!
  • Lots of Easter eggs and references (with humor, of course)
  • Communist boss, iron and dangerous with a secret weapon (good luck :D)
  • Horror elements where you never thought

content_descriptors.notes: The game has cartoonish blood and murder

name: Hitler My Friend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIndows 7 or more
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 2 core or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 or any Potato
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • VR Support: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 4 core or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 4090
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
  • VR Support: -

short_description: Welcome to the absurd world of Hitler My Friend - a 3D shooter that will change your ideas about alternative history! In this game you will climb into the boots of the unforeseen Adolf Hitler and go in search of the last representative of the Ururi race.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
